name: NSMetadataQueryDelegate
desc: An interface that enables the delegate of a metadata query to provide substitute results or attributes.

items.name: func metadataQuery(NSMetadataQuery, replacementObjectForResultObject: NSMetadataItem) -> Any
items.desc: Returns a different object for a given query result object.

items.name: func metadataQuery(NSMetadataQuery, replacementValueForAttribute: String, value: Any) -> Any
items.desc: Returns a different value for a given attribute and value.
